dt: {bc}the usually unintentionally humorous misuse or distortion of a word or phrase
{bc}the use of a word sounding somewhat like the one intended but ludicrously wrong in the context

dt.t: "Jesus healing those leopards" is an example of {wi}malapropism{/wi}.

et: Mrs. {it}Malaprop{/it}, character noted for her misuse of words in R. B. Sheridan's comedy {it}The Rivals{/it} (1775)
shortdef: the usually unintentionally humorous misuse or distortion of a word or phrase; especially : the use of a word sounding somewhat like the one intended but ludicrously wrong in the context
